item.title: Behat Step Transformations for Relative Time
item.description: class MyFeatureContext extends BehatContext { protected $dateFormat = 'Y-m-d'; /** * Transforms relative date statements compatible with strtotime(). * Example: "date 2 days ago" might return "2013-10-10" if its currently * the 12th of October 2013. Customize through {@link setDateFormat()}. * * @Transform /^(?:(the|a)) date of (?.*)$/ */ public function castRelativeToAbsoluteDate($prefix, $val) { $timestamp = strtotime($val); if(!$timestamp) { throw new \InvalidArgumentException(sprintf( "Can't resolve '%s' into a valid datetime value", $val )); } return date($this-&gt;dateFormat, $timestamp); } public function getDateFormat() { return $this-&gt;dateFormat; } public function setDateFormat($format) { $this-&gt;dateFormat = $format; } }
